other_tests.findings: Cerebrospinal fluid revealed a glucose concentration of 48 mg/dL, total protein of 184 mg/dL, and 38 white cells/mmÂ³ (42% neutrophils, 9% lymphocytes, 48% monocytes, and 1% eosinophils). Abundant yeast forms were noted. C. neoformans was isolated from cultures.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Cryptococcal antigen remained elevated in blood and cerebrospinal fluid for months.

other_tests.findings: Generalized disorganization and slowing of background activity when the patient was awake; no spikes or sharp waves.
